content: *late last year i was browsing yarns from a local dyer indigo guinea fibers - shop linked below and found a beautiful combination of worsted-weight yarns the name given to one of the colorways struck me kindness i had wanted to design a shawlette to celebrate the coming of spring and i found particular beauty and similitude in kindness growing in our hearts - blooming if you will - just as flowers begin to bloom around this time here in the northern hemisphere i wanted the pattern to be easy but not too simple and while knitting it to encourage the mindful growth of love kindness and compassion in all of us * the **kindness blooms shawlette** is a **beginner-level** worsted-weight crescent-shaped shawlette worked flat from the top down simple stockinette stripes are offset by contrasting sections representing stages of growth first a *seed stitch* section for planting the seeds of kindness second a section of *twisted knit stitches* representing new sprigs of growth third a *beautiful lace garden* of gathered and open stitches representing a field of flowers and finally a lovely *picot edge* of seed buds that travel from our hearts to the rest of the world spreading new seeds of kindness to everyone we meet **yarn** two contrasting worsted-weight yarns one solid/semi-solid and one variegated mc 70g/168 yards cc 66g/144 yards *i used indigo guinea fiber s wren 100% superwash merino worsted-weight yarn in kindness 1 4 100g/240 yards per skein and black raspberry 100g/218 yards per skein * *find indigo guinea s etsy shop and all her beautiful yarns here 1 * **needles** us size 6 4 0mm circular needles on a 30 /76cm cable **notions** a tapestry needle to weave in ends **techniques** knitting purling twisted stitches increasing switching colors picot edging **gauge** 6 sts and 4 row = 1 inch **finished dimensions** approximately 60 153cm wide by 14 36cm tall after blocking **on repeat** arc céleste by schiller & cédric monnier * relaxing lightly-electronic / acoustic song that reminds me of a beautiful video game score * this pattern is **free** wear this shawlette on a cozy sunday morning with your favorite cup of tea or while taking a walk to see the beautiful spring wildflowers in love and kindness rachael moonvale creations 1 https //www etsy com/shop/indigoguineafiber
